title: Retirement Ceremony
description: After 20 years of service in the United States Marine Corps, I will be retiring on December 19th. I d be honored if you could join my family and me for this special occasion. The ceremony will be at VMMT 204, starting at 1030.Afterward, we ll gather at The Landing for food and drinks, with a tentative start time of 1200. It ll be a great time to share memories and celebrate this milestone together.I look forward to seeing you there!

title: Retirement Ceremony for Lieutenant Colonel Adam Wilkie
location: Battleship North Carolina (1 Battleship Rd NE, Wilmington, NC 28401)
description: Please join me in thanking those who have supported me during my 21 years of Marine Corps service.                    Following the ceremony, join us for a get together at Oval and Ale @ 6pm (47 N Hampstead Village Dr, Hampstead, NC 28443)                    Out of Town Guests: Hotels in the Mayfaire Town Center (Wilmington, NC 28405) will centrally locate you between the Battleship North Carolina (22 min) and Oval and Ale (21 min).
